attributes.action: Stop Islam4UK Marching through Wooton Bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: islam4uk should not be allowed to march through wooton bassett. it would be a disgrace to the whole uk and the servicemen and women who have been repatriated through this town. sign this petition to show the pm that the march should not be allowed to go ahead.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has decided not to march through the town.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
